description: This file is a shell script used to manage the syslog service, including starting, stopping, and configuring syslog logging levels and remote logging. It interacts with system services and configuration files relevant to syslog operation.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Initializes logging levels and remote logging, starts syslog daemon, and sets service status.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the syslog daemon and updates service status.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes configuration for log level and remote logging via utctx_cmd.
